dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
From:  	 [private] <[private]@musicbox-online.com>
To: 	[private]@google.com
Date: 	Tue, 16 Oct 2007 09:50:15 -0500
Local: 	Tues, Oct 16 2007 7:50 am
Subject: 	DMCA Complaint 51.0
October 16, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
Fax: [private]

Re: Plagiarized/Copyright Content Theft

To whom it may concern:

I am writing to file a charge that obatik.com is in violation of U.S.
copyright laws. Our signature is on file with Google.

Search Query: "third track Take Care the Road You Choose"

Please note that there are other queries that generate this result.


The infringing article can be found at:

http://obatik.com/richard-thompson-sweet-warrior/

Please note: The text is hidden on the page. You need to click on "Read
Review" or view the source code in order to be able to find it.


The copyrighted work at issue was published at:

http://www.musicbox-online.com/reviews-2007/richardthompson-sweetwarrior-05232007.html


The posting of this material infringes upon the copyright held by me and
my company The Music Box. I may be contacted at the email address and
phone number listed below.


obatik.com can be reached at:

[private]
[private]@HALCYON.COM
[private]
Seattle, WA [private]
US
Phone: [private]


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,



[private]
Editor, The Music Box
[private]@musicbox-online.com
[private]
